Posts.Content: Has anyone been initially diagnosed (just found out yesterday) with breast cancer, only thru a biopsy in the lymphnode under my arm pit?  Dr cannot find  breast cancer in mammogram or ultrasound, but they know it's breast cancer from the pathology test.  I also have no symptoms. Will go to oncologist tomorrow and have Breast MRI, next week.
Posts.Title: breast cancer found only in lymphnode

Posts.Content: Bonniee, I finished radiation, next step is Arimidex for 10 years, just curious are you taking any kind of anti-estrogen?  I was lucky I got to skip chemo and just had radiation (actually not that easy), because I had primary occult breast cancer with only one of the nine lymphnodes removed (the one that was biopsied), that was cancerous.
Posts.Title: breast cancer found only in lymphnode

Posts.Content: Just to update everyone, I am primary occult breast cancer, with cancer just in one lymphnode.  I had evidently enough of a suspicious area on my mammogram, to have an ultrasound and that's how they found the cancer in my lymphnode.  The suspicious spot in my breast is abnormal cells, found after the lumpectomy, nine lymph nodes remove, with just the one being positive.  Just wanted to let you know this can happen, pretty rare, 1 out of 100 breast cancers in case anybody else is primary occult.  That will not be ruled until, all tests are done.  Including a few mammograms, breast MRI, breast biopsy, cat/PET scan before surgery, lupectomy with sample sent after surgery, cat scan after surgery.  Thank God for good insurance.  It is treated like Stage 2 breast cancer, best case scenario, awaiting radiation.  Anybody else out there with a primary occult breast cancer a few years out?
Posts.Title: breast cancer found only in lymphnode

Posts.Content: Hang in there I have a primary unknown tumor in my breast, just diagnosed on 8/11, no symptoms, found cancer in my lympnode through ultrasound (yearly diagnostic screening).  Waiting is the hardest part, waiting for my dr to call to see what other scans will be done, so far didn't show up thru mammogram, mri, or breast biopsy.  I also have let friends and family know and reached out to other survivors.
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: I have stage 2a, primary occult Breast cancer with 1 lymphnode . After radiation I will take Arimidex for 10 years . Did you have any side effects ? I also am going to try to cut down on sugar, dairy (don't really like anyway) and eventually meat which will be the hardest. I'm estrogen positive also . Worried about Arimidex.
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: It's mixed news, still doesn't show on the breast definitive as cancer on the PET scan, but having it and my lymphnodes  removed.  Hang in there, I wish my case was clearer but we deal with the unknown.
Posts.Title: SCARED
